name: Buck Selkirk Knife With Fire Starter
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: A reliable fixed blade knife is an invaluable tool outside. It can help prep food, make shelter, make fire, and other necessary tasks. Bundled with a fire steel and whistle combination you get 2 additional tools help keep you safe in the great outdoors.Strong full-tang construction with steel bolsters and pommel.Rugged hammer style pommel can drive stubborn tent pegs.CNC machined micarta handle provides a comfortable, sure grip.Plastic thermo-moulded sheath holds the knife and fire steel securely.Multi-position mounting system provides lots of wear options.Notch at the base of the blade is designed for use with the included fire steel.Fire steel and whistle combination included.
